headline: How Leadership Changes and Outlook Updates at American Tower (AMT) Have Shifted Its Investment Story
summary: American Tower Corporation recently announced that Gene Reilly, former Vice Chairman of Prologis Inc., has joined its Board of Directors, bringing four decades of experience in real property investment and management. This leadership change, combined with the company's raised property revenue outlook and strong second-quarter results, highlights American Tower's focus on business stability and infrastructure expansion amid ongoing 5G development. We’ll explore how American Tower’s improved...

headline: American Tower: We Expect Underperformance To Continue
summary: American Tower has a strong portfolio of assets, but it doesn't have S&P 500 beating shareholder returns at its current valuation. See why AMT stock is a Sell.
